description: How many times to run each test
If specified, runner will only print list of tests without running them
Test filter. Filters tests based on PerformanceTest class name or test method names with Contains function.
Text file with tests to run. Each test must be placed on a newline.
Category of tests to be executed.
Category of tests to be excluded.
Specifies an output XML file for test results. XML contains states of executed tests and possible failure messages.
Path to store build and run artifacts
Enable Asset Import Pipeline V2 backend for the test run.
Will save all the option definitions to specified file. Used by external tools
Specifies the scripting runtime version to run the tests with.
